name: InfinityPlant
description:
InfinityPlant is a strategic topdown game inspired Pikimin, where you throw your allies to gain more, attack enemies, and gather food to survive.

Controls:

  • wasd or arrow keys to move the player around.
  • Use the mouse to look around the area.
  • Hold down left mouse button to call your plantfolk towards you.
  • Right click plantfolk to pick them up & left click to throw them.
  • Make sure to check HOW TO PLAY in the Menu!

Story:

In a planet far far away, a plant like society is starting to run low on food supplies.

With no other choice. You must enter into the wild in search of food, but beware, there are monsters lurking around...

Thankfully, a new and mysterious society called the plantfolk are willing to help you.

Bugs:

  • Plantfolk can get stuck inside walls if your close enough.
  • Sometimes throwing can can stop working.

Socials:
